tool.name: BlastP Results to GFF3
tool.description: converts blast xml results to a JBrowse-compatible file

param.name: include_seq
param.label: Include protein alignment in Blast view in Apollo/JBrowse

tool.help:
**What it does**
Convert BLASTP XML results into GFF3 format for visualization within JBrowse. This is critical for displaying the position of high-scoring pairs of the Target aligned against the Query. Blast Tabular output support coming soon.
**Options::**
By selecting **Include protein alignmentâ€¦**, the actual sequence alignment will be displayed in the pop-up BLAST view in Apollo/JBrowse.
